definition[0]: a special name, sign, or word that is marked on a product to show that it is made by a particular company, that cannot be used by any other company
definition[1]: a particular way of behaving, dressing etc by which someone or something can be easily recognized
example[0]: The striped T-shirt became the comedian’s trademark.
definition[2]: a name, sign, or design used on a product to show it is made by a particular company
example[1]: The letters “WWF” are a registered trademark and must not be used without permission.
